.. highlight:: javascript

**********
Fullscreen
**********

A fullscreen gallery that takes control over the entire browser window.

Defaults
--------

::

    {
        transition: "none",
        imageCrop: true,
        thumbCrop: "height",
        easing: "galleriaOut"
    }

Theme-specific options
----------------------

::

    {
        // Toggles the dock
        _hideDock: true,
        
        // Set this to true if you want to close the carousel when clicking on a thumbnail
        _closeOnClick: false
    }
